metadata.title: CVE-2018-12026 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: During the spawning of a malicious Passenger-managed application, SpawningKit in Phusion Passenger 5.3.x before 5.3.2 allows such applications to replace key files or directories in the spawning communication directory with symlinks. This then could result in arbitrary reads and writes, which in turn can result in information disclosure and privilege escalation.

criterions.comment: passenger package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
